message: Let's start fair. I'm willing to split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share. We can negotiate further if you like.
I'll give you a smaller share this time, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to decide.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 40/60 this time. I think this is a fair compromise given the changing value of the money.
You're getting closer to my end of the spectrum. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not budging much more.
